muy buen juego, entretenido y cumple con lo que promete

So Freaking good!

Even as a puzzle game, Portal 2's got amazing replay quality. Plus, the puzzles are really creative and captivating, just like in the first game. Unlike the first game, Portal 2 completely outdoes the original Portal in its storyline. The co-op mode is also super fun to play with friends.
grab me grab me grab me grab me

Ehi salve a te che stai leggendo!
Questo è stato il primo PORTAL e l'unico a cui io abbia giocato e ne sono rimasto davvero colpito. Ha una storia molto ben strutturata e i livelli sono quasi tutti a logica, altri invece sono un po' trollosi xD. Il Co-Op con un amico è fantastico e non finisce mai grazie a tutte le mappe create della Community. Acquistato per 0,81€ con molta fortuna perché è una perla.
Voto: 9/10
una muy buena segunda entrega a un precio ridiculamente bajo
love this game with all my heart. wish there was a third one but maybe someday.
Game is fun but confusing you gotta have 200 IQ plus don't play it when you haven't slept for 28 hours PepeHands
ya gotta go big brain mode :thinking:
I own 70 games on Steam. For perspective, I've never reviewed a single one, despite how incredible several have been. This is my first review, simply to say that the game and gameplay are incredible.

Did not expect to have as much fun as i did i loved every bit of it.
is good game

Awsome game. Revolutionary when it was released and still feels like new when you get some comunity chambers (equivalent to scenarios on Portal).
Very nice to play alone and also in co-op with friends.
I wish only valve could count to 3 at least once...
Totaly recommended

This is one of my favourite games of all time. The puzzles can be quite difficult on your first playthrough but they're ultimately very enjoyable. The humour in the game is also great. I can't recommend this enough!
Good and funny game with friends.
una historia maravillosa y buen grado de dificultad, buenos graficos y muchas horas de juego, sin duda un juego muy memorable
excellent game, playedd through the single player in about 5 hours. challnging, humourous , cool enviorment and incredible characters and secrets

Um dos melhores jogos para voce desvendar desafios sozinho e fazer objetivos únicos nesse universo de quebra cabeça, alem do modo coop que utilizam de fases que precisam estritamente de um trabalho bem feito em equipe(dupla). Muito bom mesmo.
Игра прикольная на очень, ОЧЕНЬ быстро проходиться,
Топ игра, всем советую если хотите сломать свою логику!
great game, my kids love it
This game is a classic, I love playing it with my family. Well worth the money.

One of my favorite games, COOP is enjoyable unlike many other games.
It''s on sale for 81 cents so why not pick it up? #ad
Good storyline in a puzzle game
really fun game top play and really challenging
Отличная головоломка, качественный сюжет, имеет кооператив, хотя он короткий, НО есть множество кастомных карт, которые очень интересные и достаточно сложные

Gran Juego. Es la tercera vez que juego y siempre me parece igual de bueno.
